entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
